meanings.definition: To fail to meet or come together at the same time or place.
meanings.sent1: The friends mismeet at the park due to a misunderstanding.
meanings.sent2: The train mismeets its schedule because of a delay.
meanings.sent3: The picnic mismeets the sunny weather and gets rained on.
meanings.sent4: Her expectations mismeet reality like two ships passing in the night.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces mismeet, leaving the picture incomplete.

meanings.definition: To have a chance meeting or encounter.
meanings.sent1: They mismeet unexpectedly at the grocery store.
meanings.sent2: The old friends mismeet after years at a school reunion.
meanings.sent3: The cat and dog mismeet in the backyard, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Their eyes mismeet across the crowded room, sparking a connection.
meanings.sent5: The lost siblings mismeet at the train station, recognizing each other instantly.
